name: Mimic (alpha)
description:
Prototype of a puzzle game with a unique mechanic.
Mimic animals to take their form.

Controls:
- Arrow keys to move
- X to restart the level
- P for pause menu to skip levels

If the controls aren't working on mobile, please go to this link to play!

This game is still in alpha.
I am very open to feedback of any kind!
Feel free to leave a comment or shoot me a message :)
